        Compute the intersection between two vectorial lines
        Parameters:
        result -
        p0 - line1 point
        e0 - line1 direction
        p1 - line2 point
        e1 - line2 direction
        Returns:

      • lineIntersection

        public static double lineIntersection(Point2d p0,
                                      Point2d e0,
                                      Point2d p1,
                                      Point2d e1)
        Compute the intersection between two vectorial lines
        Parameters:
        result -
        p0 - line1 point
        e0 - line1 direction
        p1 - line2 point
        e1 - line2 direction
        Returns:
        the intersection parameter value (between 0 & 1 if segments intersects). POSITIVE_INFINITY if parallel

      • segmentIntersection

        public static Point2d segmentIntersection(Point2d result,
                                          Point2d start0,
                                          Point2d end0,
                                          Point2d start1,
                                          Point2d end1)
        Compute the intersection between two vectorial lines
        Parameters:
        result -
        p0 - line1 point
        e0 - line1 direction
        p1 - line2 point
        e1 - line2 direction
        Returns:
        false if segments do not intersect. true if they do (result is filled)
